title: PSP FIELDS RFS HFR Data - Stuart D. Bale (bale@ssl.berkeley.edu) (UC Berkeley Space Sciences Laboratory)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'epoch_hfr_stokes' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/psp/fields/l3/rfs_hfr/2018/psp_fld_l3_rfs_hfr_20181002_v03.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 29.6192% of the 2007 timesteps. Cadence = 6990478280 [ns] = PT6.990478S.
info.contact: Stuart D. Bale (bale@ssl.berkeley.edu) @ UC Berkeley Space Sciences Laboratory

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Time for RFS Stokes parameter data.

parameters.name: psp_fld_l3_rfs_hfr_PSD_FLUX
parameters.description: HFR Flux Density (Stokes I) data, from cross dipole measurements.

parameters.name: psp_fld_l3_rfs_hfr_PSD_SFU
parameters.description: HFR Flux Density (Stokes I) data, from cross dipole measurements, normalized to 1 AU.

parameters.name: psp_fld_l3_rfs_hfr_STOKES_V
parameters.description: HFR Circular Polarization (Stokes V) data, normalized to Stokes I.
